name: verifyuser
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for registering the new mentor

Request payload must contain the following fields:

username: STRING,
password: STRING,
mobile: STRING,
full_name: STRING,
role: STRING,
team_id: STRING,
data_of_birth: STRING ( format: "yyyy-mm-dd" ),
organization_code: STRING,
qualification: STRING,
created_by: NUMBER ( 11 characters ),
city: STRING,
district: STRING,
state: STRING,
country: STRING,

Request:

PUT - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/mentors/verifyUser

raw 
  {
    "mobile": "7878686868",
    "role": "MENTOR"
}

Response:

404 - Not Found 

  {"status":404,"status_type":"error","message":"User not found","count":null,"data":"User not found"}
